title: Is Justice For Sale Strangling The Ghana Judiciary?
content: Anas 39;s undercover investigation carried out on judges and staff of the Judicial Service of Ghana has been met with a myriad of reactions not only on front page media but in the Judicial World. Whilst so many are glad that finally the lid has been lifted on the can of worms that has so long been suspected, others are calling for Anas to be j ......
